# Bus Charter and Bus Rental Services - Ontario Region

### Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) No. E6TOR-23RM10

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bus operators to submit their proposals for a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for the provision of bus charter and rental services in the Ontario region. The selected vendors will be part of a Supply Arrangement (SA) to provide transportation services for various federal government departments and agencies.

### Key Details

* **Procurement Type**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **End User Entities**: Various federal government departments and agencies in Ontario
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Duration**: 2024-07-01 to 2029-06-30
* **Contact Information**:
  * Name: Mike Littlefield (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: [mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19970266?extsite=MTk5NzAyNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Requirements and Scope

The successful vendors will be required to provide a variety of bus services, including:

* Scheduled bus services
* Chartered bus services
* Vehicle rental services
* Transportation of personnel, including military personnel, civilians, and other stakeholders

The services will be required to meet the operational requirements of various federal government departments and agencies in Ontario.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be conducted based on variations or combinations of the above methods.

### About This Tender

This tender is posted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Please note that this tender is open to bidders from Ontario (excluding National Capital Region).
